name: Simple, Don't Die
description:
IMPORTANT:  If you are playing the web version, please use fullscreen to get the full experience!

This is a platformer with a simple goal to not die and move on to the next level that me and a friend made. This is our first game jam and we had a blast!

Features

  • Unique puzzle on each levels.
  • Limited Vision.
  • Pixel Art Style.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys or A D to move
  • E to use item
  • R to restart level

Credits

I guess you will have to beat the game to find out! :)

Also the suggested donation is just a joke although donations are greatly appreciated.
